text: hey everyone its pie here I'm just
taking a quick break out of a kitchen to
have a quick chat with you a little bit
of an update I guess as many of you know
I have been doing hot Thai kitchen for
many many years now and throughout these
years
we've accomplished many things we've had
a lot of fun with you guys but there are
so many other things we would love to do
that we can't for example I'd love to
post more videos
I'd love to post better quality videos
I'd love to host the fan meetups in
different cities that so many of you
have been asking for and so many other
ideas that both Adam and I have but the
reality is these things are really
expensive and we just can't afford them
right now so if you love what we do and
you want to help us grow and be a part
of helping us accomplish all these new
ideas you can now support us on patreon
and if you're not familiar with patreon
or patreon.com
it's an online platform where people can
go and support their favorite content
creators and that could be a musician it
could be your favorite podcaster it
could be a youtuber such as me and on
patreon basically you pledge a monthly
donation and that monthly donation can
be any amount there's no minimum even
one dollar mugs would be awesome and you
can stop it whenever you want now I know
many of you have been donating to the
show in the past on PayPal and for that
I thank you very much but one of the
reasons why I wanted to switch to
patreon is because on patreon it gives
me a way to give you something in return
as a thank you so you can call these my
perks if you will and you can find out
all about what the perks are on my
patreon page and I'll put the link in
the description box below
so I thank you very much in advance I'm
so excited at the prospect of what we're
going to be able to do and if you've got
ideas of what we could do as we grow the
show together please let me know I mean
this show is after all for you guys so I
would love to hear from you of what you
would like to see
the future and if you've got questions
as always you can get in touch with me
on Facebook Twitter or through my
website
at ign.com and i will see you in the
next video popke
[Music]
